entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 07:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets near noon and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
